value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Now, just HOW did you know
that we'd be here?$k$p$EFace|How vexing. But if you've come to
play, then I'll provide the game.
So, change of plans!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Why raze these summoning ruins
when I can simply destroy you,
$Nu?$k$pNow, let us begin!$k

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Why do I keep losing? It's really
not fair! Your kingdom has
everything.$k$pSo many Heroes...a summoner...
a pretty realm that's happy,
healthy, and wealthy!$k$pWhy do you keep tormenting me?
I have nothing—nothing that
matters!$k

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|They're retreating. But I doubt this
will be the last we see of Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I don't understand that Veronica.$k$pHer father, the Emperor of Embla,
was the one who hoarded Heroes
and warred with Askr.$k$pWhen he died, Embla declared that
his war was over. We had peace,
until she started it all up again!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Her father was very popular among
their people. He had ambitions to
make Embla powerful and prosperous.$k$p$EFace_Cool|His dream was their dream—so much
so that when he died...some of his
citizens took their lives.$k$pSuch was the darkness behind
Embla's imperial glory.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|But hope reigned again when the
crown went to his wife, the Empress,
who had no dreams of conquest.$k$pVeronica is not her daughter,
however, but rather that of his first
wife—the previous Empress.$k$p$EFace_Pain|And Veronica, one day, began going
into other worlds of her own accord,
just like her father.$k$pShe wanted to invade Askr
again too.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|The people of Embla, even its top
advisors, love her for it. They have
given her their full support.$k$pThey see Veronica as the true
heir of Embla, carrying her father's
blood and dreaming his dream.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|But though Veronica has their
support, she seems so...lonely.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|You think she's hoarding Heroes
and invading Askr because she's
lonely?$k$p$EFace|What dark days lie ahead of us
if that's the truth.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Please, remain with us,
$Nu?$k$pI fear that our war with Embla will
soon challenge us like never before.
The Order of Heroes needs you.$k$p$Sbs1000|$Fo1000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$Fi500|Let's head back to the castle,
everyone.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Hold on. Someone approaches.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Greetings.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|$w0|You again! I suppose that we owe
you thanks. Without your warning,
the ruins would have been—$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Say no more. That is not why I have
come here.$k$pI heard from the Heroes in the
World of Awakening that you're
searching for someone.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|$w0|Yes, my good friend Zacharias.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|You can stop searching. You'll
never see him again.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|What? You know of Zacharias?
Where did you see him?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|That's all I have to say on this
matter.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Wait! Don't go!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|No, Alfonse! You mustn't follow him.
We don't know his intentions.
It could be a trap—this time!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|But, Commander!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|You have your orders. We don't
know if he's friend or foe.$k$p$EFace_Anger|I'm certain we will see him again
in due time.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|If he knows anything about
Zacharias...$k$p$EFace_Pain|But, fine. I'll follow your command.
I only hope that my friend is safe...
wherever he is.$k$Sbs150|
